instructions: 直走經過左手邊的Abstract Group。
目的地就在前方的 Maxon。

companies.name: Maxon
companies.description: Maxon makes powerful, user-friendly software that artists and others working in a variety of industries use for 2D/3D design, 3D modeling, motion graphics, animation, filmmaking, digital sculpting, product and architectural visualization, editing, and rendering.
